name: Mens Winter Leather Work Gloves, Warm Thinsulate Lining for Cold Weather Work, Thermal Insulated Work Gloves with Leather Palm,100 gram Insulation-L
short_description: WINTER WORK GLOVE: Keep Warm in Cold Weather, 100% Full Grain Cowhide provides superior abrasion and puncture resistance. The cowhide has good thermal insulation to help retain heat. Reinforced palm patch enhances durability and grip. 100-gram Thinsulate creates warmth without bulk. The warm Thinsulate Lining is soft and sweat-absorbent, keeping your hands dry and warm during winter work.
ADJUSTABLE WRIST: Hook and loop wrists can be tied tightly to prevent dust and debris, while also protecting against the wind in cold weather.

GUNN CUT AND KEYSTONE THUMB DESIGN: Gunn cut ergonomically reduces pressure and increases comfort. These work gloves have superior durability and flexibility because the seams are set away from the palm. Palm part with Reinforced Palm Patch design on the key point, Increase Excellent Grip and Durability.

WATER RESISTANT & WINDPROOF: The top grain cowhide winter working gloves provide the water resistant condition. The surface of the cow leather has a special waterproof film, keep hands dry.If immersed in water, the surface will become wet, and your hands will remain dry. It is not recommended to soak in water for a long time.

WIDE RANGE APPLICATION: These cold weather WINTER work gloves are useful for heavy-duty or outdoor work and are suitable for the yard, motorcycle driving, gardening, construction, truck driving, wood cutting, farming, moving, digging and etc. Sizes S to XXL to fit both men and women.

name: Men's Winter Leather Work Gloves, 100-gram Thinsulate, Cowhide, Lined Leather, Large (Wells Lamont 1108L) , Yellow
short_description: 100% GRAIN COWHIDE: High abrasion & puncture-resistant leather creates a durable winter work glove
WINTER WORK GLOVES: 100-gram 3M Thinsulate insulation and fleece lining create warmth in cold weather without bulk
COMFORTABLE FIT: Ergonomic Gunn cut design for a good fit and dexterity
IDEAL FOR: Farming, ranching, driving, construction, equipment operation, home projects, and more!
product_description: Product Description This warm winter work glove is made from full grain cowhide leather, which is naturally abrasion and puncture resistant. 100-gram 3M Thinsulate and fleece lining keep hands warm when you’re out in cold weather. The ergonomic Gunn cut design provides better fit and flexibility. Suggested uses: driving, equipment operation, farming/ranching, maintenance, road machinery, snow blowing, snow shoveling. Wells Lamont — Stubborn About Quality Since 1907. From the Manufacturer This Grain Cowhide Glove has cotton fleece over foam insulation that is fully wrapped in a brushed nylon lining. This style has glove within a glove construction process that has the insulation wrapped completely around the fingers to minimize heat loss. This method costs more, but delivers the best results. The cotton fleece lining is warm 100% cotton jersey. The polyurethane foam provides additional insulating qualities. The grain cowhide leather is treated with lanolin. This produces a softer, more flexible glove. The lanolized leather actually lasts an adverage of 28% longer than our untreated leather. The lanolin also helps the leather repel moisture and stay soft, even after wetting. The shirred wrist provides an attractive look and makes the glove easier to take on and off. The glove has Gunn cut construction and the continuous thumb. Large Men's.
